summary: Utility module for DynamoDB model handling, offering a custom JSON encoder that translates DynamoDB attribute types (including Decimal, binary data, and sets) into standard JSON, along with helpers for estimating byte size of values and locating nested keys within dictionaries.
business_intent: Enable the Moto DynamoDB mock to produce JSONâ€‘compatible representations of DynamoDB items and assist internal operations such as size estimation and nested key retrieval, thereby supporting testing and debugging of DynamoDB interactions.
